subject: Soccer
UEFA European Football Championship
lead_paragraph: Petr Jiracek and Vaclav Pilar scored in the first six minutes as the Czech Republic rebounded from its opening 4-1 loss to Russia in Group A.
snippet: Petr Jiracek and Vaclav Pilar scored in the first six minutes as the Czech Republic rebounded from its opening 4-1 loss to Russia in Group A.
